Natanz Black Granite

Natanz Black Granite is a kind of black granite quarried in Iran. This stone is especially good for Exterior - Interior wall and floor applications, monuments, countertops, mosaic, fountains, pool and wall coping and other design projects. It also called Nero Natanz Granite,Oureh Black Granite,Ureh Black Granite . Natanz Black Granite can be processed into Polished, Sawn Cut, Sanded, Rockfaced, Sandblasted, Tumbled and so on.

Share to: facebook Tweet Google+ Buy Now

Data on Natanz Black Granite

Name: Natanz Black Granite

Catalog:Granite

Color: Black

Country: Iran ( Ureh Village, Natanz County, Isfahan Province )

Recommended Usage: Exterior - Interior wall and floor applications, monuments, countertops, mosaic, fountains, pool and wall coping

Finishing Surface: Polished, Sawn Cut, Sanded, Rockfaced, Sandblasted, Tumbled

Additional Names: Nero Natanz Granite,Oureh Black Granite,Ureh Black Granite

Natanz Black Granite is a Black Granite from Iran
